text: Mbega ntubona yuko Imana yamanuye amazi iyakuye mubicu hanyuma iyacisha hasi, nukuba amasoko y’amazi ari mukuzimu, hanyuma inagisha ivyamwa vy’ubwoko butandukanye, rero uca ubona ivyo vyamwa vyumutse nuguhindura amabara y’umuhondo, hanyuma bigaca bitangura gucika gurika, ntankeka muri ibi vyose harimwo ivyibutso ku bantu bafise ubwenge
